Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its high quality and versatility, we're confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm extending an exclusive offer to you today, priced at $12000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the market value and the unique benefits this product provides. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can elevate your satisfaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
